testcase.name: Verify REST calls
testcase.system-out: Given user perform get call on "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/1" url.passed Then verify response contains "sunt aut facere repellat provident occaecati excepturi optio reprehenderit" string.passed Then verify response contains "DoubleQuoteuserIdDoubleQuote: 1," string.....passed When user perform get post call on "http://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts" url with "{D_QtitleD_Q:D_QfooD_Q,D_QbodyD_Q: D_QbarD_Q,D_QuserIdD_Q: D_Q1D_Q}" json.passed Then verify response contains "foo" string..................................passed Then verify response contains "bar" string..................................passed Then verify response "201" code.............................................passed Then verify post call "foo" title value.....................................passed Then verify post call "bar" body value......................................passed
